snippet: Mark Cutifani, who will take over as chief at the platinum producer, will confront strikes at mines, cost overruns at some projects and a share price that has been lagging rivals.
lead_paragraph: Mark Cutifani, who will take over as chief at the platinum producer, will confront strikes at mines, cost overruns at some projects and a share price that has been lagging rivals.

headline.main: Challenges Facing New Chief of Anglo American
headline.print_headline: Challenges Facing New Chief of Anglo American
